name: Burgundy Golf and Spa Chateau
description:
DESCRIPTION
A 16th century Castle and classified historical monument which is now a stylish four star hotel is perfect for any luxury wedding, combining historical grandeur with modern comfort.
The whole property can be privatised for your event! There is a total of 45 bedrooms in the Castle and 8 apartments in the Clos Champagnac.
The Castle is an ideal setting for weddings given its prestigious site and its experience in hosting many different weddings. The team can tailor your wedding to suit your requirements and there are different size function rooms, inner courtyard, exterior courtyard for a large marquee and also there are two specially designed space at the Le Clos Champagnac for functions.
Throughout the preparations for your wedding, you can count on our event team to support you and answer your questions. For the coordination of the event, Elodie and Anne are present by your side to make this day the most beautiful of your life.
Le Salon de Loges is available for your celebration and can cater for 150 guests. For more guests, you are welcome to use more than one of the Salons.
There is a range of exceptional menus available, curated by the Castle's team of talented chefs.
At this outstanding resort, there are 45 bedrooms and suites and 8 apartments with 1 to 6 bedrooms. The self-catering apartments are situated just 100 meters from the castle.
There are one restaurant and two bars in the main castle building and a snack bar at the golf shop.
The 18-hole golf course and practice facilities are onsite for the golf enthusiasts. For the non-golfers, why not schedule a golf initiation with the golf instructor during your stay!
During your stay, make sure to schedule a massage or treatment at the Vinésime and Charme d'Orient Spa. Also, relax in the jacuzzi, sauna, steam room and outdoor heated swimming pool (open from May through October). To keep fit, we have a fitness studio, tennis court and bikes for rent.
The hotel is ideally located to explore the Burgundy area including the famous Burgundy vineyards, historical Abbayes, castles and medieval villages.
Additional information:
Dogs are welcome
The fitness studio is open 24 hours
Wine tasting with the Sommelier
The full privatisation of the castel is mandatory (starts at 19500 €). This includes the privatisation of the hotel, 2 restaurants and spa. We can accomodate around 90 people and catar for 150 people. Please note food and beverage are not includes in the price.
If you would like anymore information then please do send us an email and we will be more than happy to help.
